TopicTitle: Kerbal Attachment System (KAS) 0.4.7 - Pipes as fuel lines and even fewer explosions!

Articles.Content: CALM your selves give it time and love be patient unless you want to fix the code yourself

KAS is causing null refs in the 32bit build, which can completely destroy a craft and/or cause ctd. It is not stable. What sucks is that other mods are tied to KAS rather directly.

Can anyone tell me which is correct?

Can anyone tell me which is correct?

It is fubared in 32bit and 64bit, anyone who says otherwise just hasn't tested it enough
It would probably be fixed by now if Majiir's time wasn't being wasted with the ModStats BS
So the haters are at fault, as always!

Can anyone tell me which is correct?

If you look at your output log and debug in game you'll find my statement is correct.

I laughed so hard I cried. I hit the floor and my roommate thought I was choking. she came running out of her room to see if I needed medical attention.

I run KSP on the Mac so the relevance of the 32/64 discussion escapes me. When I try to run KSP 2.4 I am told that the KAS mod is incompatible. I would like to run 2.4 but KAS is integral to all of my missions so I cannot afford to get well into it and then find that something critical does not work. Any helpful suggestions would be welcome.
Tested it in 32-bit and it's working just fine for me. No explosions. I guess it's a 64-bit problem then.

All I can say is that it (still) Works For Me. Both normal parts and KAS parts can be repeatedly grabbed, attached, linked, etc. etc. Containers can be opened, parts added/removed, the Container can be grabbed and put back into its bracket.

Sorry, not sure how to embed imgur albums like everybody seems to do, but here's a link to some screenshots:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Edit: 64-bit Debian GNU/Linux "Jessie", running the 64-bit client. Plenty of mods.

Edited July 23, 2014 by micha
Add platform; embed album

I run KSP on the Mac so the relevance of the 32/64 discussion escapes me. When I try to run KSP 2.4 I am told that the KAS mod is incompatible. I would like to run 2.4 but KAS is integral to all of my missions so I cannot afford to get well into it and then find that something critical does not work. Any helpful suggestions would be welcome.

The "incompatible" message is a result of the game's version checker, and does not necessarily mean that the mod is broken, just that it's out of date and hasn't been compiled for the new (current) version. By all accounts, KAS still works just fine with the 32 bit client, for Mac and Windows.

All I can say is that it (still) Works For Me. Both normal parts and KAS parts can be repeatedly grabbed, attached, linked, etc. etc. Containers can be opened, parts added/removed, the Container can be grabbed and put back into its bracket.
